entry.title: Women's night of tennis
entry.content: Thank you to all our customers and friends who came out to a Women’s night of tennis! Congratulations to the raffle ticket winners, and we hope the rest of you had a great time and learned more about the University Club, Ada’s Cafe, each other, and how we can all help you have a lot of fun with tennis.

entry.title: New Site Launch!
entry.content: We migrated Tennis Town and Country from a flash based site to a jazzy new smart-phone compatible site. It is simpler, streamlined, and should be more informative to you (our valued customers) in the upcoming months.
